member.name: T:ADHDmail.LogWriter
member.summary:
A simple log file writer.
The default log file location is in the LocalAppData folder.

member.name: M:ADHDmail.LogWriter.Write(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Appends text to an existing log file, or to a new one if the file does not exist.
member.param: The message to record in the log.
An optional parameter that automatically obtains the method or property name of the caller to the method.
An optional parameter that automatically obtains the full path of the source file that contains the caller. This is the file path at compile time.
An optional parameter that automatically obtains the line number in the source file at which the method is called.
